original_text: And when he humbled himself, the wrath of the Lord turned from him, that he would not destroy him altogether: and also in Judah things went well.
korean_text: 르호보암이 스스로 겸비하였고 유다에 선한 일도 있으므로 여호와께서 노를 돌이키사 다 멸하지 아니하셨더라

sentences.original_text: wrath of Lord turned from him
that he would not destroy him altogether
and also in Judah things went well
